sentences: See oli tõeline tahtma,“ ütles vana mees.
Tahtma on raske seletada, see tuleb tunda.
Ma ei saa aru sellest tahtmast, mis sind valdab.
context: The word 'tahtma' in Estonian refers to a strong will, desire or intention. It’s often used to describe a deep-seated wish or a determined course of action. It can also imply a sense of fate or destiny.
